column5: Financial mathematics is a specialism vital to the day-to-day functioning of the world's economic institutions. Technical and theoretical aspects of mathematics are applied practically in this fascinating discipline, which involves predicting the behaviour of markets, suggesting strategies for investment and managing risk.
